description: Retrieves the sprite sheet corresponding to a map resource. The sprite sheet is a PNG image paired with a JSON document describing the offsets of individual icons that will be displayed on a rendered map.

parameters.name: MapName
parameters.description: The map resource associated with the sprite ï¬le.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The name of the sprite ï¬le. Use the following ï¬le names for the sprite sheet: sprites.png sprites@2x.png for high pixel density displays For the JSON document containing image offsets. Use the following ï¬le names: sprites.json sprites@2x.json for high pixel density displays.

nested_items.name: Blob
nested_items.description: Contains the body of the sprite sheet or JSON offset ï¬le.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: The content type of the sprite sheet and offsets. For example, the sprite sheet content type is image/png, and the sprite offset JSON document is application/json.

nested_items.name: CacheControl
nested_items.description: The HTTP Cache-Control directive for the value.
